item.title: Game Swords and Sandals Online
item.description: During this game you will go on an exciting journey. Start an adventure, move around the location, communicate with other characters and find useful items. Of course, battles are also waiting for you, during which you will need to destroy evil enemies. Attack opponents and defeat them, trying to increase your skill level.
